import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { getByDisplayValue } from '@testing-library/dom' export default function StoreProduct() { const idProduct = useParams().product const [productDetail, setProductDetail] = useState() useEffect(() => { const service = axios.create({ baseURL: "http://localhost:3001", withCredentials: true, }); const resDb = async () =>{ console.log("este es el detail") const detail = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/product/detail/${idProduct}`) //setProductDetail(detail.data) } console.log("soy useEffect") resDb() }, []) return ( <> { productDetail === undefined?():( //

{productDetail.name}

$66.00

{productDetail.description}

{productDetail.material}

  • {productDetail.size[0]}
  • {productDetail.size[1]}
  • {productDetail.size[2]}
Add cart
) } ) }
